get.description: This endpoint returns a list of surahs based on the provided query parameters.

parameters.name: mushaf
parameters.description: The mushaf name to filter the surahs.

parameters.name: lang_code
parameters.description: The language code for surah translations.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria for the surah list.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order (ascending or descending).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start index for pagination.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End index for pagination.

200.description: Successful response containing a list of surahs.

post.description: Add a new surah to the database.

requestBody.description: Details required to add the surah

200.description: The surah has been successfully added to the database.

get.description: Returns the single surah

schema.description: Specifies the format of the response. Options are 'text' or 'word'
Language code for the translation. Defaults to 'en' if not provided

200.description: Returns the single surah

post.description: Edit surah with the specified UUID.

parameters.name: surah_uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the surah to edit.

requestBody.description: Details required to update the surah

200.description: Surah edited successfully.

500.description: Internal server error occurred during the operation.

error_name.description: A unique identifier for the error type.

delete.description: Deletes the surah identified by the specified UUID.

schema.description: UUID of the surah to be deleted.

200.description: The surah identified by the UUID has been successfully deleted.

get.description: Returns a list of phrases and their translations for the specified language code. If a translation is not available for a phrase, it will be returned as null.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'ar' for Arabic).

200.description: Return's list of phrases related to language

post.description: Edit or add phrases and their translations for the specified language.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language code (e.g., 'en' for English, 'ar' for Arabic).

requestBody.description: A JSON object containing phrases as keys and their translations as values.

200.description: Phrases edited or added successfully

delete.description: Delete all phrases related to the specified language code

200.description: All phrases related to the language code have been deleted
